app.title: Leonardo.Ai - Image Generator
app.description:
Welcome to Leonardo.Ai , the ultimate AI art image generator, now available on Android!

Harness the power of Leonardo.Ai  on your Android phone or tablet and unlock a world of creative possibilities.

Take charge of your creative process with precise control over every aspect of your digital art generation. Use prompts, negative prompts, tiling, and more to fine-tune your results

Utilize our general-purpose or finetuned presets to generate production-ready art and design assets effortlessly. Our models can produce a wide range of high-quality AI art and design assets.

Maximise your creativity with Leonardo Phoenix, our foundational model gives next-level prompt adherence, coherent and flexible text in image, and rapid ideation with iterative prompting.

Unleash your imagination and create a universe of infinite possibilities in just minutes. Rapidly iterate concepts and explore various styles while ensuring consistency.

Join a community of over 21 million creative minds and access more than 1.7 billion images already generated using Leonardo.Ai . Start creating breathtaking art today!

Please note: By using this app, you agree to our Privacy Policy (https://leonardo.ai/legal-notice/ ) and Terms of Service (https://leonardo.ai/terms-of-service/ ).

Harness the power of Leonardo.Ai on your Android phone or tablet and unlock a world of creative possibilities.

Take charge of your creative process with precise control over every aspect of your digital art generation. Use prompts, negative prompts, tiling, and more to fine-tune your results

Utilize our general-purpose or finetuned presets to generate production-ready art and design assets effortlessly. Our models can produce a wide range of high-quality AI art and design assets.

Maximise your creativity with Leonardo Phoenix, our foundational model gives next-level prompt adherence, coherent and flexible text in image, and rapid ideation with iterative prompting.

Unleash your imagination and create a universe of infinite possibilities in just minutes. Rapidly iterate concepts and explore various styles while ensuring consistency.

reviews.text: Honestly one of the best AI generators out there. I like the concept of having limited "tokens", like specifically for a non-subscribed part; and even then once you run out, it is reset every 2 hours so.. The AI is quite accurate, although it may take a few tries sometimes for very specific things. Definitely the best one around.

The app is great. It has incredible features that are easy to use. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for an exceptional experience with Ai. The only problem though is it sometimes produces images of hands with 7 fingers or the fingers turned upside down. I woul sppreciate if you correct this minor problem

Amazing app that generates amazing photos and videos. They have a free option which I find to be great. There are paid tiers as well. The only downside is that on the free version, you don't have the option to purchase more tokens if you wanted to. They have these themed daily contests where you can win tokens, though. It's a great app overall. Easy user interface and beginner friendly!

I was thrilled at first, then experienced some issues that weren't immediately addressed, but eventually were addressed. It was a little long before I finally got a response, when I did they really did follow up and obviously worked hard to fix the problem. At the end of the day it's a pretty great app, there isn't any better one out there for image generation.

I'm starting to wonder it the accounts praising this app are bots, because coming from someone who has used a lot of ai image generating app, THIS IS HANDS DOWN THE WORSE. I would give it a zero star if I could. It never generates what it's supposed to, and the images are always seriously deformed. I'm talking 15 fingers, 3 arms, 2 faces, several human beings conjoined kind of deformed. In short, this app is not worth your time.

What is this Leonardo? I had this app on my iPhone and it was great. I just bought Galaxy Ultra and I can't use this app anymore. It's absolutely terrible! I can't remix images, I can't insert any images from my phone's library and I can barely scroll down to view my Leonardo AI library. Presets are not the same either. Moreover, I can't even pick favorites. Looks very different from what I'm used to seeing on my iPhone or my computer. Very upsetting.

Leonardo AI is an amazing tool for creating high-quality AI-generated art. It’s fast, detailed, and super easy to use. Whether you want realistic images, concept art, or unique digital designs, this app delivers stunning results! The customization options and constant updates make it even better. If you're into AI art, this is a must-have!

Asked it to create 10 individual images to match with 10 different topic sent to it and it ends up creating a few random images (not 10) including somehow the topics in a random way, not visually appealing and that cannot be matched with the topics listed. Waste of time. Didn't work for me, therefore I'm uninstalling.

I learned and explored this app and my experience so far has been excellent. For anyone who wants to create a single image, a simple illustration or also several pieces of digital art, this app is awesome. I'm enjoying it and loving it ❤️🙏🏻😃

I would give this app 6 stars if I could, it creates beautiful artwork. it's an all must for anyone who wants to boost their content and work or just make some wallpapers, the tokens reset daily and it's just phenomenal of what you are able to create and do with it. The best ai art app I've found by far ✨🖤✨

app.developerLegalAddress: Suite 1007, 120 High St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
app.recentChanges: This update introduces Lucid Realism (Kino 2.0) for ultra-realistic images and a new Ultra quality option for high-definition visuals. We've also made improvements to the video generation process and implemented various backend enhancements for a smoother experience.
app.AIReview:
Leonardo.Ai - Image Generator Review

Overview

Leonardo.Ai – Image Generator is an AI art generation application available for Android, boasting over 4.4 million installs and a solid 4.37-star rating. The app’s core premise is straightforward: leveraging artificial intelligence to create digital artwork based on user prompts. It positions itself as the "ultimate AI art image generator," aiming to empower users with granular control over their creative output, moving beyond simple text-to-image generation towards a more nuanced and professional workflow for artists and designers. The app’s free tier provides access to a substantial range of features, making it an accessible entry point into the world of AI art creation.

Key Features

The app's functionality is built around several key elements designed to facilitate the image generation process:

  • Prompt-Based Generation: Users input textual prompts describing the desired artwork. The app utilizes its underlying AI model to interpret these prompts and generate images accordingly.
  • Negative Prompts: A critical feature allowing users to explicitly state what not to include in the generated image, significantly refining output and mitigating common AI art pitfalls (e.g., "no blurry faces").
  • Tiling: This allows for the generation of seamless patterns and textures, useful for backgrounds, repeating elements, or creating larger assets efficiently.
  • Presets: Leonardo.Ai offers both general-purpose presets (designed for broad artistic styles) and finetuned presets – specifically trained models optimized for particular art genres or design applications like photorealism, anime, or concept art. These presets dramatically reduce the need for extensive prompt engineering.
  • Image Upscaling: The app includes a basic image upscaling feature to increase resolution without significant quality loss – useful after generating lower-resolution initial outputs.
  • Seed Control: This allows users to lock in a specific "seed" value, ensuring consistency between multiple generations based on the same prompt and settings. Useful for iterative refinement.
  • Community Features (Limited): While not fully developed, the app offers a basic feed showcasing images generated by other users, providing inspiration and demonstrating potential use cases.

Strengths

  • Accessibility & Free Tier: The fact that Leonardo.Ai is free to download and use represents a significant strength. It removes the financial barrier to entry for exploring AI art generation. The features available in the free tier are remarkably robust, allowing users to create impressive visuals without spending a dime.
  • Granular Control: Compared to simpler text-to-image apps, Leonardo.Ai offers a surprisingly high degree of control through prompts, negative prompts, tiling, and seed control. This empowers users to shape their creations far more effectively.
  • Finetuned Presets: The availability of finetuned presets is a game-changer. These models are demonstrably better at producing targeted art styles than relying solely on generic prompts. The ability to quickly generate photorealistic images or stylized artwork dramatically increases the app's utility.
  • Large User Base & Active Community (Emerging): With over 4.4 million installs, Leonardo.Ai benefits from a sizable user base, creating an environment for sharing ideas and discovering new prompting techniques. The community feed, though nascent, provides inspiration.

Areas for Improvement

  • Processing Speed: Image generation speeds can be noticeably slow, particularly with complex prompts or high-resolution requests. This is a common issue with AI models but could benefit from optimization.
  • Community Features – Lack of Depth: The community feed feels underdeveloped and lacks robust features like user profiles, direct messaging, or advanced search capabilities. It's currently more of a passive gallery than an active social platform.
  • Preset Management: While presets are powerful, the organization and discovery process could be improved. A more intuitive system for browsing and filtering presets would significantly enhance usability. The current method relies heavily on simply scrolling through the available options.
  • Upscaling Quality Variance: The image upscaling feature produces inconsistent results. Sometimes it drastically improves quality, other times it introduces artifacts or blurring.
  • Prompt Library: A built-in prompt library with categorized suggestions would be a welcome addition to help new users understand how to craft effective prompts and explore different creative avenues.

User Experience

The app’s user interface is generally clean and intuitive. The main screen presents a prominent "Generate" button alongside options for selecting presets, adjusting settings (seed, tiling), and navigating the community feed. The prompt input field is straightforward, with clear guidance on formatting prompts effectively. However, the sheer number of available settings can be overwhelming for novice users – a guided tutorial or onboarding process would greatly improve the initial user experience. Navigating between the different features feels reasonably smooth, though some transitions could benefit from further refinement.

Value for Money

As a free app, Leonardo.Ai offers exceptional value. The core functionality is robust and allows users to create impressive art without any financial commitment. While paid subscriptions are available (details not fully disclosed in the app description), they appear geared towards unlocking higher resolution generations and potentially faster processing speeds – features that would undoubtedly be beneficial for professional use.

Conclusion

Leonardo.Ai - Image Generator represents a significant step forward in accessible AI art generation on Android. Its combination of powerful features, granular control, and a generous free tier makes it an excellent choice for both beginners and experienced artists looking to experiment with this rapidly evolving technology. While areas for improvement remain – particularly regarding processing speed and community features – the app’s strengths significantly outweigh its weaknesses. With ongoing development and refinements, Leonardo.Ai has the potential to become the go-to application for creating stunning AI art on mobile devices.
